faqs.question: What is a normal heart rate?
faqs.answer: A normal resting heart rate for adults ranges from 60-100 beats per minute. Athletes may have lower rates (40-60 bpm) due to better cardiovascular fitness.

faqs.question: What is normal blood pressure?
faqs.answer: Normal blood pressure is typically less than 120/80 mmHg. Elevated is 120-129/<80, Stage 1 hypertension is 130-139/80-89, and Stage 2 is ≥140/≥90.

faqs.question: Tell me about Krushna's coding skills
faqs.answer: Krushna is proficient in Java, C, C++, Python for programming. For web development: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js. Also skilled in SQL, Tableau, Excel for data analytics, plus Git, GitHub, Docker, and Vercel for development tools.

faqs.question: What projects has Krushna worked on?
faqs.answer: Krushna has built several impressive projects: FitOS Dashboard (AI health OS), Task Flow (quantum-themed productivity app), Quantum Calendar (interactive calendar), and an AI Resume Builder using NLP.

faqs.answer: Krushna holds certifications from Deloitte Australia (Data Analytics), EA Software Engineering, Tata Data Visualization, Cyber Security & Log Analysis, and Oasis Infobyte Web Development Internship - all from 2025.

faqs.question: What is KIT?
faqs.answer: KIT stands for 'Krushna In Tech' - representing Krushna's brand as a Full Stack Developer and AI & Cloud Enthusiast focused on turning innovative ideas into impactful solutions.

faqs.question: What coding tips do you have?
faqs.answer: Focus on clean, readable code. Practice data structures and algorithms regularly. Build projects to apply your learning. Use version control (Git) consistently. Stay updated with new technologies and best practices.
